product.title: Sunny Stripes (1270)
product.description: The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. relproducts.title: White Blackout Blind For Velux Skylights
relproducts.description: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

relproducts.title: Telescopic Control Rod
